cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'maybe' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup for DRBs.

du.explanation_en: Setting drb_integrity to an invalid enum value 'maybe' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup for DRBs.
du.explanation_zh: 將 drb_integrity 設定為無效的枚舉值 'maybe' 會導致配置解析錯誤，並阻止 DRB 的正確安全設定。
